Title: Authorizes the use of the Cayuga county jail for the detention of persons under arrest being held for arraignment in any court located in the county of Cayuga
Summary: Authorizes the Cayuga county jail to be used for the detention of persons under arrest being held for arraignment in any court located in the county of Cayuga.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the correction law, in relation to authorizing the Cayuga county correctional facility to also be used for the detention of persons under arrest being held for arraignment in any court located in the county of Cayuga
